name: phobos's defence
description:
history:

Somewhere in advanced army complex during testing new AI.  she go on web, and she learn to take control of computer and create huge virtual infestation. Now last part of humanity try to retake control of with other AI ... After a long time of peace , wars is coming . You and phobos are send in scientist complex , to take control a quantum computer. phobos is robot with AI , build to understand and reverse infestation.

task :

protect phobos during he fix system (blue icon).

who do it:

build turret at good position , only on green zone.

  1. left click : tesla's turret , zone damage on short range.
  2. right click : blaster turret, constant unidirectional line damage on long range.

right click on blaster for rotate.

Bonus:
  • no framework (homemade)
